entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: WSW 54 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
